DOC.brief_title: Can Dispatcher-Activated Neighborhood Access Defibrillation Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Improve Survival out-of Hospital Cardiac Arrest ?
DOC.detailed_description: Out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) major health problem , occur 1 1,500 adult develop country year . Although layperson CPR defibrillation crucial component chain survival , layperson CPR rate 's quality low public-access defibrillation ( PAD ) program cost-effective.If train bystander know information occurrence OHCA near place automate external defibrillator ( AED ) time dispatch center , neighborhood could run give high quality CPR early defibrillation . If protocol , Dispatcher-Activated Neighborhood Access Defibrillation Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( NAD-CPR ) , introduce community , may improve survival OHCA .
